content.question: Suppose that  fr  is a properly instantiated reference to a  Fraction  object. Which of the following best describes the conditions under which the call  fr.getDecimal()  will fail to return a value?

choices.label: When the instance variables  numerator  and  denominator  have the same value
When the instance variables  numerator  and  denominator  have different values
When the instance variable  denominator  is equal to  0
When the instance variable  denominator  is negative

content.answer: When the instance variable  denominator  is equal to  0

skill.text: 4.B: Describe the initial conditions that must be met for a code segment to work as intended or described.
